---
name: Feature request
about: New printer command, code page, or API improvement
title: "[FEAT] "
labels: enhancement
---

**What do you need?**
A clear description of what you want to add or change.

**Why?**
What use case does this unlock?

**Printer / spec reference (if applicable)**
e.g. "Epson ESC/POS Application Programming Guide, page 47"

**Are you willing to implement it?**
Yes / No / Maybe with guidance
